cost_functions.name: max_err_ddy_a_a
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddy_a_a - ddy_a_ex) ./ max( abs( ddy_a_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddy_a_b
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddy_a_b - ddy_b_ex) ./ max( abs( ddy_b_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddy_b_a
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddy_b_a - ddy_a_ex) ./ max( abs( ddy_a_ex))

cost_functions.name: max_err_ddy_b_b
cost_functions.definition: abs( ddy_b_b - ddy_b_ex) ./ max( abs( ddy_b_ex))
